```{r setup, include=FALSE}
packages_to_load <- c("knitr", "rmarkdown", "devtools", "tibble")

for (i in packages_to_load) {
  if (!require(i, character.only = TRUE)) {
    install.packages(i)
  } else {
    library(i, character.only = TRUE)
  }
}

rm(packages_to_load)

install_github("hadley/emo")
library(emo)

options(htmltools.dir.version = FALSE)

opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE, fig.align = "center")
```

# Toy data

```{r create toy data, echo = F}
toys <- tibble(
  name = c("Teddy bear", "Fire truck", "Basketball", "Frog", "Skeletor"), 
  color = c("brown", "red", "orange", "green", "blue"), 
  price = c(15, 5, 10, 12, 20)
)
```
